Name: :math:`nb_\text{HOUR}^{t}`
Description: Number of hours for each time-step

Name: :math:`V_\text{BAS, MAX}^{b,~s\_b}`
Description: Basins water volume upper boundary for each state

Name: :math:`V_\text{BAS, MIN}^{b,~s\_b}`
Description: Basins water volume lower boundary for each state

Name: :math:`V_\text{BAS, DIS}^{t,~b}`
Description: Water volume entering a basin due to runoff and snowmelt

Name: :math:`F_\text{TUR}^{b,~h}`
Description: Factor to specify whether the turbined water of a plant is added into a basin or removed

Name: :math:`F_\text{PUM}^{b,~h}`
Description: Factor to specify whether the pumped water of a plant is added into a basin or removed

Name: :math:`Q_\text{TUR, MAX}^{h,~s\_h}`
Description: Max water flows that can be turbined for each state

Name: :math:`Q_\text{PUM, MAX}^{h,~s\_h}`
Description: Max water flows that can be pumped for each state

Name: :math:`\alpha_\text{TUR, AVG}^{h,~s\_h}`
Description: Average factor for converting turbined water flow into generated electrical power for each state.

Name: :math:`\alpha_\text{PUM, AVG}^{h,~s\_h}`
Description: Average factor for converting pumped water flow into consumed electrical power for each state.
